description: This is a C++ source test file for the TextReader class, utilizing Google Test framework to verify TextReader functionality.

classes.name: TextReader
classes.description: A class that reads text fragments from a data element, supporting operations like reset and read line.

classes.name: DataElement
classes.description: A data container constructed with size and value, used by TextReader.

classes.name: TextFragment
classes.description: Represents a fragment of text retrieved from TextReader.

methods.name: Reset
methods.description: Resets the TextReader to its initial state.

methods.name: EndOfText
methods.description: Checks if the reader has reached the end of the text.

methods.name: ReadLine
methods.description: Reads a line of text from the current position.
